block.p: Jennifer Marie Delfoe, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Edward F. Delfoe 3d of Cold Spring Harbor, N.Y., was married yesterday to John Christian Fleissner 5th, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Fleissner 4th of Summit, N.J. Msgr. Charles Ribaudo performed the ceremony at St. Dominic's Chapel in Oyster Bay, N.Y.

Mrs. Fleissner, 27, is an audit manager in the financial markets practice of Arthur Andersen in New York. She graduated from the University of Richmond. Her father is a vice president for marketing at Galey & Lord, a textile company in New York. Her mother, Jean Delfoe, teaches French at Cold Spring Harbor High School.

Jennifer Marie Delfoe, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Edward F. Delfoe 3d of Cold Spring Harbor, N.Y., was married yesterday to John Christian Fleissner 5th, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Fleissner 4th of Summit, N.J. Msgr. Charles Ribaudo performed the ceremony at St. Dominic's Chapel in Oyster Bay, N.Y.

Mrs. Fleissner, 27, is an audit manager in the financial markets practice of Arthur Andersen in New York. She graduated from the University of Richmond. Her father is a vice president for marketing at Galey & Lord, a textile company in New York. Her mother, Jean Delfoe, teaches French at Cold Spring Harbor High School.

Mr. Fleissner, 29, is known as Chris. He is an associate in the new products group at Goldman Sachs & Company, the New York investment bank. He graduated from Boston College. His mother, Barbara L. Fleissner, is a substitute teacher in the Summit school district. His father is the president of the Standard Embossing Plate Manufacturing Company in Newark and of Gloversville Embossing in Gloversville, N.Y.
